title: Checking Out Charitable Groups
description: This chapter focuses on researching and evaluating charitable organizations to ensure informed giving decisions. Students learn how to assess transparency, financial health, and effectiveness of nonprofits.
learning_objectives: Understand the importance of researching charitable organizations before donating
Evaluate the transparency and financial health of nonprofit organizations
Apply the PACED decision-making model to compare charitable organizations
Use charity evaluation tools to assess organization effectiveness
Align charitable giving decisions with personal values and goals

skill_builder.title: Charity Evaluation Tool
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool that helps students research and evaluate charitable organizations based on transparency, financial health, and impact.
